00033 class NEVFile : public ifstream
00034 {
00035         public:
00040                 NEVFile(string filename) : filename(filename),nRecords(-1),t(-1),gap(-1),shift(0) {};
00044                 NEVFile() : filename(""),nRecords(-1),t(-1),gap(-1),shift(0) {};
00048                 virtual ~NEVFile() {};
00053                 virtual void set(string filename) { this->filename = filename; };
00058                 virtual void open() throw(NLXError);
00062                 virtual void init();
00067                 virtual bool readRecord();
00071                 virtual bool restarted();
00075                 virtual void writeRecord(ofstream &output);
00079                 virtual void setShift(Time s);
00083                 virtual void addToShift(Time s);
00088                 virtual long getNRecords() { return nRecords; };
00093                 virtual Time getTimestamp() { return t; };
00098                 virtual Time getGap() { return gap; };
00102                 virtual void showFileHeader();
00103 
00104         private:
00105

00113                 char                    fileHeader[NEV_FILE_HEADER_SIZE];

00121                 Time                    t0;
00125                 Time                    t;
00129                 Time                    gap;
00133                 Time                    shift;
00137                 char                    event[128];
00141                 char                    previousEvent[128];
00142 };
